system.description:
You become much more formidable than your unassuming appearance would suggest. You gain the following benefits:

  • Improvised weapons you wield do 1d12 of base damage, but can only be used for 4 successful attacks before they break and become useless.

  • You learn the Catch Your Breath maneuver, which does not count against your maneuvers known.

  • If you are not being observed and have a disguise kit, you can change your appearance as a bonus action, by quickly changing clothing, throwing on a wig, or making some other fast, non-magical alteration to your appearance, imposing disadvantage on checks to recognize you based on your previous appearance.

  • Once per turn, you can deal extra weapon damage when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, dealing an extra 2d8 points of damage. In order to apply this damage, you must not have disadvantage on the attack and your target must be within 5 feet of another enemy of the target who is not incapacitated. Alternatively, you can apply this additional damage if you have advantage on the attack.
